tweet:
#200DaysofProgress:
✅cleaning up corruption
✅lowering health care costs
✅$15 minimum wage
✅equal pay for women 
✅protecting workers’ pensions 
✅background checks for gun sales
✅net neutrality
 https://wapo.st/2ykxKQ4

STARTING NOW: @WaysMeansCmte is working on a bill to protect Social Security & make the system strong for the future. Michiganders who work their entire lives & contribute every paycheck should be able to rely on Social Security when they retire.

Watch:  http://bit.ly/2Gtzprg
Happy Birthday, @RepRashida! You are a true fighter who works every day to support Michiganders and I’m proud to serve with you in Congress.

Great news! The House just passed the #StopBadRobocalls Act I cosponsored to stop the onslaught of robocalls once and for all. This comprehensive bill requires every call to be verified, allows the blocking of spam calls and empowers @FCC to protect Americans from scammers. pic.twitter.com/PkjXaYFy1X

Every American who works hard and plays by the rules deserves to retire with dignity. That includes having their pension protected that they paid into their entire life. 

Today, the House is voting on the #ButchLewisAct to ensure workers can count on pensions they have earned. pic.twitter.com/ZQacIfz4tR

This week, the new Democratic majority tackles the pension crisis. We will vote on the #ButchLewisAct to protect 1.5 million failing pension plans and make sure every family retires with dignity. https://twitter.com/LeaderHoyer/status/1151136538043924483 …

Proud to join @SenKamalaHarris & @RepLawrence in introducing the Water Justice Act. With smart investments, we can secure clean drinking water for all. Learn more ⬇️ https://twitter.com/detroitnews/status/1153310478942244866 …

A great morning on the Grand Blanc @McDonalds rooftop with @PatandAJ, helping to support Whaley’s Children’s Center! Thanks to @WCRZFM for helping to support such an amazing local organization. pic.twitter.com/C7yKoPLDGW

Great news! The House just passed the #RaiseTheWageAct to give American workers a raise and boost our economy.
 
Michiganders are working harder than ever, but their wages have not kept up with rising costs. This bill would give 1,470,400 Michiganders a long-overdue raise. pic.twitter.com/j5ybvTTfSN

When we needed them, they were there for us. What kind of country are we if we fail to take care of our 9/11 heroes? The House has acted—Senate Republicans and Mitch McConnell should stop blocking this critical bill. #Renew911VCF https://twitter.com/thehill/status/1151547132954009600 …
Nice photo, @TrevorNoah and @TheDailyShow. 😎 For what it’s worth, I'm considering a resolution to declare Michigan’s @VernorsSoda better than everything else! pic.twitter.com/rswJea9f9p

The Trump Administration right now is in court trying to eliminate the Affordable Care Act, which would gut protections for Americans with pre-existing conditions. We can’t go back.

@HouseDemocrats are fighting to #ProtectOurCare and improve our health care system. pic.twitter.com/L9raymBDDK

The President’s tweets, once again, are a distraction from the issues people care about most—lowering health care costs, increasing wages & making government work better. But the President’s words fly in the face of our American values. We have to speak up and reject such hate.
Every Member of Congress, Democratic and Republican, should strongly condemn @realDonaldTrump’s racist tweets. This shouldn’t be hard. Yet the silence from the GOP is deafening.
🙏🏻 Thank you to the @MichStatePolice, the Oscoda Sheriff’s office and all emergency personnel who helped search for Gabriella. https://twitter.com/WTOL11Toledo/status/1151207909935763456 …

If Republicans are successful in eliminating the Affordable Care Act, 720,000 Michiganders would lose their health care. I’ll always fight to #ProtectOurCare. https://twitter.com/RepDebHaaland/status/1151102933263687680 …

I had the privilege of working side by side with Gary throughout his public service. He cared deeply about our state & making sure every child had a good neighborhood to grow up in. My condolences to Sheila and the Corbin family during this difficult time. http://bit.ly/2O6SR34

Republicans & Democrats just joined together to passed my resolution on #Sudan that calls on the Transitional Military Council to end violence against peaceful protestors and transition to a democracy.

Congress’ action today affirms the world is watching. http://bit.ly/2LnVNWZ

I'll be speaking on my bipartisan resolution advocating for peace and democracy in #Sudan on the floor of the House of Representatives shortly. 

Tune in to watch:  https://cs.pn/2XXKzyz

The President’s attacks on @RepRashida and other Members of Congress are racist, vile and un-American. He has continuously shown through his actions that he seeks to divide us as a nation and bring out the worst in people. America, we are better than this.

My legislation to address #PFAS just passed the House. The bill would:
- Phase out PFAS in firefighting foam
- Designate PFAS as a hazardous substance
- Boost funding for a nationwide health study
- Help identify new PFAS sites
- Ensure the Defense Department is held accountable pic.twitter.com/YXUX5FyVm8

Today, I voted to support our 9/11 heroes so they may have the peace of mind knowing that the September 11th Victim Compensation Fund will be there to help them and their families as long as they need it.
 
Proud of @HouseDemocrats for passing this important bill. #Renew911VCF pic.twitter.com/kHGzW7tVsY

Happiest of birthdays to @RepSlotkin! Michiganders are lucky & fortunate to have you in Congress fighting for working families. Thanks for your work to help lower the cost of health care & prescription drugs, and to protect Americans with pre-existing conditions.
👇🏼👇🏼👇🏼 https://twitter.com/CBSNews/status/1148984174801555456 …

.@RealDonaldTrump, vetoing this bill because of my amendment to address #PFAS chemicals is wrong.

Don't hold up funding for our troops and fail to protect public health. Stand with our military & families affected by #PFAS instead of special interests. https://bit.ly/2G43X2o

Michiganders shouldn't live in fear that their hard-earned retirement is at risk of collapse. That's why the @WaysMeansCmte is working on the #ButchLewisAct to ensure retirees receive the benefits they’ve earned over decades of hard work.
 
We won't leave American workers behind. pic.twitter.com/agtbunN4ID

Today, the Trump Administration is asking the court to strike down protections for people with pre-existing conditions. Michiganders deserve quality, affordable health care and I will fight against the President's reckless efforts to take away health care from families. https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1148554924416020480 …
Congratulations, @USWNT! With back-to-back #FIFAWWC championships, you make our entire nation proud. #USWNT https://twitter.com/USWNT/status/1147911775708467201 …

This week, I sat down with Genesee County veterans to hear more about the issues affecting them and their families. I will continue to work in Congress to make sure our nation’s veterans have the health care, jobs and benefits they deserve. pic.twitter.com/TUVcZmOHt7
Happy #4thofJuly! Hope you can celebrate our country today with family and friends. pic.twitter.com/ZBNsFijk5T

Lucetia is the lead caseworker on my staff and has spent her career serving our country—first in the Navy and then as a public servant. I was proud to present her with the 30 year service pin to honor her career in public service. I’m grateful she’s on my team. pic.twitter.com/ZR7Zl5b1u1

Grateful to the folks at Conquest Deer Farm in Davison for showing me more about their local business and what they are doing to stop chronic wasting disease in deer. Small businesses like these keep our mid-Michigan economy strong. pic.twitter.com/L5ykhobr1m

I have pushed the Air Force to act more quickly to address #PFAS and this announcement is welcome news that they are beginning to act with more urgency.
 
In Congress, I'll keep working to keep Oscoda residents & Michiganders safe from these chemicals. http://bit.ly/2XfJ3TV

Today, the Michigan delegation is at the Brandon Road Lock & Dam learning more about the threat of Asian carp in the Great Lakes. We are committed to working together, Republicans and Democrats, on a permanent solution that stops invasive species from entering the Great Lakes. pic.twitter.com/I5hg7nGdJf

As the people of #Sudan bravely come together to have their voices heard, the reports that a number of peaceful protestors have been killed are unconscionable. I condemn these atrocities and call on an end to the violence. https://bbc.in/2RL8nzY
